_sText:
I wanted to make some breakable doors for ZPS, but it also works for CSS too. I suggest turning down the health of the doors if you plan on using this for CSS.

Installation: To place into your map, delete all the walls in this prefab, they should already be grouped together. 
Then, delete the doors that you dont want in your map. Then when you have the door you want, select it and copy.
OR
Simply select the door you want and copy.


Type Of Doors

----------KEY----------------
BH= Breakable Hinges
BD= Breakable Door
BLM= Breakable Lock Mechanism
L= Lockable
POD=Push Openable Door
-----------------------------

Door 1
BH
BLM
BD
L

Door 2
BLM
BD
L

Door 3
BD
L

Door 4
BD

Door 5
BH

Door 6
BH
L

Door 7
L

Door 8
BLM
L

Door 9
BH
BD
L

Door 10
L
BH
BLM

Door 11-NOTE: Only can open door through the knob and door is a bit glitchy.
BLM
L
POD
